import { useEffect, useRef } from "react" import "./intro.scss" import { init } from 'ityped' const Intro = () => { const ref = useRef() useEffect(()=>{ init(ref.current, { showCursor: false, strings: ['Developer', 'Designer', 'Content Creator' ], }); },[]) return (

Hi There, I'm

Chris Evans

Web

) } export default Intro
